      • probabilityCorrect

        public static java.lang.Double probabilityCorrect(java.lang.Double p,
                                  java.lang.Integer k)
        Takes as input the probability q of a single worker being correct, and the number of workers k that we use and returns the probability that the majority of the workers will return back the correct answer
        Parameters:
        p - The quality of an individual worker
        k - The number of independent workers
        Returns:
        The probability that the majority of the workers will return back the correct answer
